description.raw:
The next major version of gazebo (11) will use the versions of ignition dependencies corresponding to ignition citadel. These dependencies require c++17 and cmake 3.10. These dependencies are available in Ubuntu Bionic, but not xenial. The planned list of these versions is in the following pull requests:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/48/add-the-citadel-gazebodistro-file/diff

There is a significant API change required: ignition-math6 renamed the `ignition::math::Box` class to `ignition::math::AxisAlignedBox`, so this type is changed in any API's that used `ignition::math::Box` in 39d46a2. There are also some API changes to `ignition::math::Inertial` (see 46356e6), but that doesn't affect gazebo's API.

There's also a significant behavior change in ~~ignition-msgs4~~ ignition-msgs5, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

~~ignition-fuel-tools3~~ ignition-fuel-tools4 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires ~~sdformat8 8.4.0~~ sdformat9 9.0.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff

There are also some API changes to ignition::math::Inertial (see 46356e6), but that doesn't affect gazebo's API.

There's also a significant behavior change in ignition-msgs4 ignition-msgs5, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

ignition-fuel-tools3 ignition-fuel-tools4 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires sdformat8 8.4.0 sdformat9 9.0.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

  • #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
